itemDescription: Businessperson and corporate director, former Chair, President and CEO of Colgate-Palmolive

wikipedia_page.main: Ian M. Cook is a British businessman. He served as the chairman, president and chief executive officer of Colgate-Palmolive.

response: * Ian Cook (geographer), professor of geography at the University of Exeter
* Ian Cook (racing driver) in 1967 Tasman Series
